examples.example: 可爱的长颈鹿在广阔的草原上悠闲地吃着树叶。

translate.english: The lovely giraffe is leisurely eating leaves on the vast prairie.

examples.example: 长颈鹿优雅的身影成为了动物园里最吸引人的一道风景。

translate.english: The elegant figure of the giraffe has become the most attractive scenery in the zoo.

examples.example: 长颈鹿那长长的脖子优雅地伸展着，像是在和天空对话。

translate.english: The long neck of the giraffe gracefully stretches out, as if it is talking to the sky.
